- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-760">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-760">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-761">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-761">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-762">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-762">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-763">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-763">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-764">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-764">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-765">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-765">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-766">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-766">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="a697e-767">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-767">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-768">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-768">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="a697e-769">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-769">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-770">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-770">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-771">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-771">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-772">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-772">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-773">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-773">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-774">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-774">The string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-775">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-775">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-776">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-776">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-777">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-777">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-778">대/소문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 43-53 자 사이의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-778">Any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-779">문자열 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-779">The string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-780">소문자 또는 대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-780">Any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-781">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-781">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-782">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-782">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-783">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-783">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-784">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-784">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-785">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-785">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-786">Azure Service Bus 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-786">Azure Service Bus Connection String</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-787">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-787">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-788">문자열 "끝점" 뒤에 "servicebus" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 나와 있는 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-788">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="a697e-789">net "및" SharedAccesKey "을 차례로 누릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-789">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-790">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-790">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-791">문자열 "끝점"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-791">The string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-792">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-792">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-793">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-793">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-794">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-794">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-795">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-795">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-796">문자열 "servicebus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-796">The string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="a697e-797">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-797">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-798">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-798">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-799">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-799">The string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-800">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-800">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-801">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-801">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-802">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-802">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-803">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-803">Any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-804">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-804">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-805">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-806">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-807">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-808">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-808">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-809">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-809">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-810">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-810">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-811">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-811">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-812">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-812">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-813">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-813">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-814">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-814">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-815">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-815">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-816">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-816">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-817">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-817">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-818">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-818">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-819">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-819">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-820">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-820">127.0.0.1</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-825">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-825">Azure Storage Account Key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-826">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-826">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-827">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열은 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-827">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-828">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-828">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-829">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-829">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-830">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-830">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-831">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-831">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-832">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-832">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-833">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-833">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-834">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-834">The string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-835">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-835">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-836">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-836">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-837">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-837">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-838">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-838">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-839">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-839">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-840">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-840">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-841">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-841">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-842">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-842">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-843">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-843">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-844">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-844">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-845">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-845">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-846">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-846">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-847">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-847">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_azureemulatorstorageaccountfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-848">CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-848">CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-849">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-849">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-850">Eby8vdM02xNOcqFlqUwJPLlmEtlCDXJ1OUzFT50uSRZ6IFsuFq2UVErCz4I6tq/K1SZFPTOtr/KBHBeksoGMGw = =</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-850">Eby8vdM02xNOcqFlqUwJPLlmEtlCDXJ1OUzFT50uSRZ6IFsuFq2UVErCz4I6tq/K1SZFPTOtr/KBHBeksoGMGw==</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-851">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-851">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-852">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-852">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-853">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-853">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-854">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-854">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-855">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-855">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-856">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-856">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-857">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-857">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-858">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-858">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-859">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-859">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-860">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-860">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="a697e-861">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-861">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-862">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-862">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="a697e-863">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-863">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-864">Azure 저장소 계정 키 (일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-864">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-865">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-866">아래 패턴에 윤곽선이 있는 문자 앞 이나 뒤에 오는 86 문자의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-866">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-867">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-868">보다 큼 기호 (>), 아포스트로피 ('), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 숫자 기호 (#) 0-1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-868">0-1 of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-869">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-869">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-870">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-870">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-871">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-871">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-872">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-872">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-873">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-873">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-874">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-874">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-875">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-875">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-876">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-876">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-877">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-877">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-878">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-878">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-879">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-879">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-880">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-880">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-881">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-881">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-882">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-883">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-883">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-884">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-885">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-885">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-886">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-886">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-887">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-887">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-889">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-889">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-893">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-893">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-894">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-894">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-895">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-895">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-896">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-896">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-897">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-897">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-898">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-898">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-899">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-899">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-900">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-900">dlno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-903">führerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-903">führerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-904">fuhrerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-904">fuhrerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-905">fuehrerscheinnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-905">fuehrerscheinnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-906">führerschein-veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-906">führerschein- nr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-907">fuehrerschein-Veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-907">fuehrerschein- Nr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-908">fuehrerschein-veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-908">fuehrerschein- nr</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-909">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-909">Belgium national number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-910">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-910">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-911">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-912">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-912">11 digits plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-913">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-914">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-914">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-915">생년월일을 나타내는 YY.MM.DD 형식의 6자리 숫자와 마침표 2개 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-915">Six digits and two periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-916">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-916">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-917">세 개의 순차적 숫자(남성의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 짝수) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-917">Three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-918">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-918">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-919">검사 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-919">Two digits that are a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-920">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-920">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-921">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-921">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-922">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-922">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-923">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-923">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-924">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-924">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-925">Keyword_belgium_national_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-925">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-926">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-926">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
  <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-985">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-985">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-986">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-986">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-987">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-987">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-988">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-988">Two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-989">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-989">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-990">2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-990">Two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-991">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-991">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-992">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-992">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-993">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-993">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-994">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-994">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-995">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-995">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-996">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-996">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-997">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-997">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-998">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-998">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-999">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-999">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1000">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1000">belgian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1001">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1001">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1002">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1002">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1003">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1003">paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1004">reisepass kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1004">reisepass kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1005">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1005">reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1006">벨기에 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1006">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1007">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1007">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1008">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1008">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1009">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1009">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1010">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1010">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1011">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1011">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1012">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1012">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1013">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1013">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1014">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1014">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1015">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1015">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1016">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1016">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1017">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1017">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1018">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1018">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1019">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1019">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1039">벨기에 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1039">Belgium tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1040">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1040">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1041">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1041">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1042">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1042">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1043">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1043">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1044">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1044">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1045">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1045">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1046">"0" 또는 "1"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1046">A "0" or "1"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1047">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1047">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1048">"0" 또는 "1" 또는 "2" 또는 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1048">A "0" or "1" or "2" or "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1049">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1049">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1050">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1050">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1051">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1051">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1052">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1052">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1053">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1053">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1054">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1054">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1055">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1055">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1114">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1114">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1115">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1115">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1116">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1116">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1117">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1117">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1118">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1118">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1119">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1119">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1120">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1120">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1121">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1121">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1122">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1122">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1123">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1123">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1124">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1124">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1125">검사 숫자에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1125">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1126">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1126">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1127">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1127">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1128">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1128">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1129">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1129">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1130">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1130">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1131">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1131">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1132">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1132">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1133">Keyword_brazil_cpf에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1133">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1134">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1134">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1135">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1135">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1136">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1136">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1137">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1137">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1139">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1139">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1142">등록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1142">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1143">별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1143">Revenue</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1149">브라질 legal 엔티티 번호 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1149">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1150">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1151">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1151">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1152">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1152">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1153">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1153">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1154">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1154">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1155">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1155">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1156">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1156">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1157">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1157">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1158">3자리 숫자(처음 8자리 숫자는 등록 번호임) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1158">Three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1159">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1159">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1160">4자리 지점 번호 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1160">Four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1161">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1161">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1162">검사 숫자에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1162">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1163">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1164">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1164">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1165">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1166">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1166">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1167">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1167">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1168">Keyword_brazil_cnpj에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1168">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1169">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1170">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1170">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1171">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1171">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1172">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1172">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1184">Company</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1184">Company</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1185">CNPJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1185">CNPJ</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1187">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1187">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1194">브라질 국립 식별 카드 (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1194">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1195">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1195">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1196">Registro Geral (이전 형식): 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1196">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1197">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식): 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1197">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1198">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1199">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1199">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1200">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1200">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1201">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1201">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1202">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1202">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1203">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1203">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1204">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1204">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1205">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1205">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1206">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1206">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1207">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1207">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1208">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1208">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1209">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1209">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1210">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1210">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1211">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1212">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1213">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1214">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1214">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1215">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1215">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1216">Keyword_brazil_rg에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1216">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1217">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1218">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1219">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1219">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1220">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1221">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1221">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1222">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1222">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1223">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1223">Cédula de identidade</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1229">RG(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1229">RG (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1231">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1231">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1232">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1232">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1233">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1234">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1234">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1235">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1236">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1236">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1237">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1238">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1238">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1239">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1240">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1241">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1241">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1242">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1242">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1261">불가리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1261">Bulgaria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1262">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1262">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1263">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1263">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1264">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1264">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1265">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1265">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1266">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1266">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1267">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1267">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1268">출생 순서에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1268">Two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1269">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자와이에 해당 하는 짝수 자리 숫자 및 암의 홀수 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1269">One digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1270">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1270">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1271">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1271">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1272">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1272">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1273">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1273">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1274">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1274">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1275">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1275">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1276">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1276">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1277">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1277">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1278">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1278">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1323">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1323">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1324">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1324">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1325">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1325">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1326">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1326">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1327">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1327">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1328">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1328">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1329">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1329">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1330">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1330">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1331">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1331">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1332">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1332">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1333">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1333">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1334">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1334">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1341">불가리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1341">Bulgaria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1342">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1342">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1343">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1344">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1344">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1345">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1346">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1346">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1347">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1347">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1348">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1348">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1349">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1349">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1350">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1350">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1351">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1351">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1352">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1352">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1353">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1353">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1354">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1354">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1399">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1399">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1400">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1400">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1401">7 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1401">Seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1402">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1402">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1403">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1403">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1404">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1404">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1405">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1405">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1406">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1406">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1407">3 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1407">Three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1408">"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1408">A zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1409">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1409">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1410">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1411">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1411">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1412">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1413">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1413">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1414">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1414">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1415">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1415">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1416">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1416">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1417">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1417">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1418">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1418">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1419">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1419">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1443">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1443">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1444">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1445">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1445">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1446">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1447">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1447">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1448">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1448">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1449">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1449">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1450">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1450">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1451">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1451">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1452">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1452">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1453">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1453">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1454">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1454">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
