## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1590">캐나다 건강 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1590">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1591">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1591">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1592">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1592">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1593">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1593">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1594">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1594">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1595">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1596">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1596">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1597">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1598">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1598">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1599">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1599">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1600">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1600">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1601">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1601">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1603">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1603">personal health number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1605">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1605">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1606">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1606">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1607">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1607">automobile accident</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1609">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1609">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1610">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1610">workers compensation</span></span>

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1612">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1612">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1613">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1613">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1614">2개의 대문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1614">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1615">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1615">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1616">2개의 대문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1616">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1617">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1617">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1618">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1618">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1619">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1619">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1620">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1620">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1621">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1621">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1622">Keyword_canada_passport_number 또는 Keyword_passport의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1622">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1652">캐나다 PHIN (개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1652">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1653">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1654">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1654">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1655">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1656">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1656">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1657">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1658">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1658">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1659">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1660">DLP 정책은 300 Regex_canada_phin 문자 근사에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 경우이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 한다는 것을 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1660">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1661">Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces에서 키워드가 두 개 이상 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1661">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found..</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1662">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1662">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1663">Keyword_canada_phin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1663">Keyword_canada_phin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1664">social insurance number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1664">social insurance number</span></span>

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1694">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1694">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1695">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1696">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백을 포함하는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1696">Nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1697">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1698">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1698">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1699">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1699">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1700">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1700">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1701">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1701">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1702">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1702">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1703">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1703">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1704">서식 없음: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1704">Unformatted: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1705">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1705">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1706">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1706">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1707">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1707">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1708">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1708">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1709">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1709">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1710">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1710">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1711">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1711">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1712">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1712">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1713">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1713">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1714">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1714">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1715">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1715">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1716">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1716">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1717">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1717">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1718">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1718">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1743">칠레 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1743">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1744">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1745">7-8 자리 숫자와 구분 기호 확인 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1745">7-8 digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1746">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1747">7-8자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1747">7-8 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1748">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1748">1-2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1749">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1749">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1750">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1750">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1751">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1751">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1752">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1752">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1753">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1753">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1754">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1754">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1755">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1755">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1756">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1756">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1757">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1757">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1758">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1758">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1759">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1759">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1760">Keyword_chile_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1760">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1761">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1761">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1762">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1762">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1763">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1763">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1764">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1764">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1765">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1765">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_chile_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1766">Keyword_chile_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1766">Keyword_chile_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1772">실행</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1772">RUN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1773">Rol Único Tributario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1773">Rol Único Tributario</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1775">Cédula de Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1775">Cédula de Identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1776">Número De Identificación Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1776">Número De Identificación Nacional</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1777">Tarjeta de identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1777">Tarjeta de identificación</span></span>

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1779">중국의 중국 id 카드 (PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1779">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1780">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1781">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1781">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1782">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1783">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1783">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1784">주소 코드에 해당하는 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1784">Six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1785">생년월일에 해당하는 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1785">Eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1786">주문 코드에 해당하는 3자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1786">Three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1787">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1787">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1788">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1789">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1789">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1790">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1791">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1791">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1792">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1792">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1793">Keyword_china_resident_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1793">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1794">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1794">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1795">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1795">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1796">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1796">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1797">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1797">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1799">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1799">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1800">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1800">Resident Identity Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1802">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1802">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1803">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1803">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1804">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1804">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1805">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1805">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1806">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1806">鉴定</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1808">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1808">居民 身份證</span></span>

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1810">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1810">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1811">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1811">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1812">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 (dddddddddddddddd), Luhn 테스트를 통과 해야 하는 16 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1812">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1813">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1813">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1814">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1814">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1815">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1816">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1816">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-1817">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1818">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1818">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1819">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1819">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1820">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1820">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1821">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1821">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1822">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1822">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1823">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1823">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1824">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1824">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-1825">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1825">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1826">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1826">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-1827">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-1827">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2033">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2033">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2034">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2034">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2035">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2035">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2036">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2036">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2037">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2037">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2038">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2038">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2039">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2039">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2040">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2040">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2041">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2041">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2042">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2042">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2043">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2043">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2044">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2044">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2045">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2045">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2046">**Keywords_croatia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2046">**Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2047">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2047">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2048">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2048">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2049">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2049">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2050">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2050">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2051">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2051">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2052">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2052">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2053">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2053">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2054">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2054">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2055">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2055">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2056">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2056">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2057">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2057">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2058">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2058">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2059">vozačka dozvola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2059">vozačka dozvola</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2060">크로아티아 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2060">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2061">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2061">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2062">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2062">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2063">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2063">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2064">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2064">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2065">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2065">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2066">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2066">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2067">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2067">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2068">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2068">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2069">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2069">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2070">Func_croatia_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2070">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2071">Keyword_croatia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2071">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2102">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2102">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2103">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2103">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2104">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2105">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2105">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2106">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2106">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2107">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2107">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2108">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2108">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2109">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2109">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2110">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2110">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2111">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2111">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2112">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2112">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2113">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2113">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2114">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2114">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2115">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2115">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2116">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2116">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2117">크로아티아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2117">croatian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2118">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2118">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2119">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2119">broj putovnice</span></span>

   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2120">크로아티아 OIB (개인 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2120">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2121">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2121">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2122">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2122">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2123">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2123">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2124">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2124">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2125">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2125">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2126">최종 자릿수는 국제 데이터 교환 목적을 위한 검사 숫자 이며, HR는 11 자리 숫자 앞에 추가 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2126">Final digit is a check digit For the purposes of international data exchange, the letters HR are added preceding the eleven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2127">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2127">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2128">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2128">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2129">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2129">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2130">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2130">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2131">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2131">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2132">Keyword_croatia_oib_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2132">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_oib_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2133">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2133">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2134">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2134">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2135">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2135">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2136">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2136">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
<Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2137">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2137">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_oib_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2138">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2138">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2139">Personal Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2139">Personal Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2140">Osobni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2140">Osobni identifikacijski broj</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2141">OIB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2141">OIB</span></span> 

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2142">크로아티아 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 하는 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2142">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2143">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2143">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2144">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2145">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2145">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2146">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2146">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2147">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2147">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2148">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2148">Ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2149">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2149">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2150">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2150">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2151">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2151">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2152">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2152">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2153">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2153">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2154">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2154">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2155">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2155">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2156">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2156">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2157">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2157">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2174">크로아티아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2174">Croatia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2175">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2175">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2176">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2176">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2177">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2177">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2178">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2178">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2179">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2179">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2180">임의로 선택한 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2180">Ten digits, randomly chosen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2181">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2181">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2182">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2182">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2183">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2183">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2184">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2184">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2185">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2185">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2186">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2186">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2187">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2187">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2188">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2188">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2189">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2189">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2204">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2207">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2207">tax no#</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2220">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2220">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2221">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2221">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2222">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2222">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2223">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2223">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2224">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2225">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2225">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2226">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2226">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2227">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2227">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2228">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2228">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2229">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2229">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2230">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2230">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2231">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2231">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2233">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2233">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2237">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2237">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2238">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2238">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2239">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2239">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2240">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2240">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2241">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2241">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2242">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2242">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2243">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2243">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2245">άδεια οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2245">άδεια οδήγησης</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2246">키프로스 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2246">Cyprus national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2247">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2247">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2248">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2248">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2249">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2249">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2250">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2250">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2251">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2251">Ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2252">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2252">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2253">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2253">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2254">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2254">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2255">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2255">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2256">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2256">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2257">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2257">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2258">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2258">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2259">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2259">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2260">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2260">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2261">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2261">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2262">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2262">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2263">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2263">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2264">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2264">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2265">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2265">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2266">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2266">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2267">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2267">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2268">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2269">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 6-8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2269">One letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2270">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2271">한 문자 다음에 6 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2271">One letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2272">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2273">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2273">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2274">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2275">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2276">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2276">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2277">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2277">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2278">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2278">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2279">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2279">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2280">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2280">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2281">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2281">cyprus passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2282">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2282">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2283">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2283">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2284">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2284">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2285">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2285">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2286">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2287">지정 된 패턴에서 8 자리 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2287">Eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2288">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2289">8 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2289">Eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2290">"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2290">A "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2291">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2291">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2292">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2292">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2293">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2294">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2294">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2295">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2296">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2296">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2297">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2297">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2298">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2298">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2299">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2300">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2300">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2301">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2301">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2302">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2302">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2303">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2303">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2304">세금 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2304">tax identification code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2305">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2305">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2306">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2306">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2307">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2307">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2308">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2308">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2309">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2309">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2310">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2310">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2311">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2311">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2312">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2312">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2313">taxidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2313">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2314">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2314">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2315">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2315">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2316">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2316">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2317">tic #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2317">tic#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2318">tic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2318">tic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2319">언급 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2319">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2320">언급 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2320">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2321">언급 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2321">tin#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2327">φορολογικού κωδικού</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2327">φορολογικού κωδικού</span></span>
