## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2329">체코어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2329">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2330">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2330">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2331">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2332">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2332">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2333">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2334">8 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2334">Eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2335">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2335">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2336">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2336">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2337">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2337">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2338">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2338">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2339">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2339">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2340">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2340">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2341">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2341">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2342">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2342">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2343">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2343">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2344">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2344">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2345">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2345">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2346">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2346">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2347">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2347">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2348">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2348">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2349">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2349">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2350">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2350">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2351">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2351">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2352">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2352">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2353">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2353">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2354">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2354">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2355">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2355">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2356">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2356">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2357">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2357">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2358">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2358">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2359">řidičský prúkaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2359">řidičský prúkaz</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2360">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2360">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2361">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2361">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2362">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2362">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2363">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2363">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2364">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2364">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2365">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2365">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2366">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2366">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2367">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2367">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2368">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2368">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2369">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2369">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2370">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2370">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2371">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2371">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2372">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2372">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2373">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2373">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2374">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2374">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2375">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2375">czech passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2376">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2376">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2377">cestovní pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2377">cestovní pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2378">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2378">pas</span></span>

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2379">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2379">Czech personal identity number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2380">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 번들에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2380">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National identification number bundle and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2381">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2381">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2382">선택적 슬래시 (이전 형식)가 있는 9 자리 숫자와 슬래시 (새 형식)가 있는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2382">Nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2383">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2383">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2384">9 자리 숫자 (이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2384">Nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2385">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2385">Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2386">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2386">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2387">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2387">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2388">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2388">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2389">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2389">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2390">10 자리 숫자 (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2390">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2391">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2391">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2392">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2392">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2393">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2393">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2394">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2394">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2395">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2395">Four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2396">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2397">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2397">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2398">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2399">DLP 정책은 300 Func_czech_id_card 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 85% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2399">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2400">Keyword_czech_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2400">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2401">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2401">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
<Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497"      patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
      <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2402">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2402">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2403">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2403">czech personal identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2404">Rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2404">Rodné číslo</span></span>



## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2405">체코어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2405">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2406">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2406">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2407">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2407">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2408">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2408">Ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2409">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2409">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2410">10 자리 숫자와 백슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2410">Ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2411">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2411">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2412">백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2412">A backslash</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2413">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2413">Three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2414">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2414">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2415">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2416">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2416">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2417">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2418">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2418">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2419">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2419">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2420">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2420">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2421">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2421">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2422">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2422">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2438">체코어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2438">Czech tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2439">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2439">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2440">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2441">선택적 백슬래시가 있는 9 자리 또는 10 진수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2441">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2442">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2443">선택적 backslashl이 있는 아홉 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2443">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslashl:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2444">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2444">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2445">백슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2445">A backslash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2446">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2446">Three or four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2447">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2448">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2448">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2449">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2450">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2450">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2451">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2451">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2452">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2452">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2491">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2491">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2492">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2492">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2493">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2494">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2494">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2495">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2496">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2496">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2497">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2498">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2498">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2499">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2500">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2500">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2501">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2501">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2502">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2502">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2503">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2503">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2504">**Keywords_denmark_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2504">**Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2505">| dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2505">|dl#</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2519">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2519">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2520">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2520">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2521">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2521">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2522">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2522">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2523">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2523">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2524">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2524">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2525">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2525">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2526">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2526">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2527">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2527">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2528">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2528">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2529">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2529">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2530">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2530">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2531">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2531">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2532">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2532">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2533">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2533">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2534">덴마크어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2534">danish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2535">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2535">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2536">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2536">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2537">pasnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2537">pasnummer</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2538">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2538">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2539">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2539">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2540">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2540">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2541">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2541">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2542">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2542">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2543">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2543">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2544">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2544">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2545">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2545">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2546">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2546">Four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2547">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2547">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2548">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2548">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2549">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2549">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2550">DLP 정책은 300 Regex_denmark_id 문자 근사에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 경우이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 한다는 것을 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2550">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_denmark_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2551">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2551">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2552">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2552">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
<Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2604">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2604">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2605">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2605">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2606">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2606">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2607">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2607">Ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2608">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2608">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2609">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2609">Ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2610">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2610">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2611">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2611">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2612">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2612">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2613">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2614">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2614">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2615">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2616">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2616">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2617">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2617">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2618">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2618">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2619">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2619">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2620">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2620">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2634">덴마크 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2634">Denmark tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2635">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2635">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2636">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2636">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2637">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2637">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2638">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2638">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2639">Hyphenl를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2639">Ten digits containing a hyphenl:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2640">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2640">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2641">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2641">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2642">첫 번째 숫자가 출생 세기에 해당 하 고 마지막 숫자가 개별 성별에 해당 하는 시퀀스 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (남성의 경우 홀수 및 암에도 해당)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2642">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number where the first digit corresponds to the century of birth and the last digit corresponds to the individual's gender (odd for male and even for female)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2643">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2643">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2644">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2644">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2645">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2645">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2646">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2646">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2647">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2647">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2648">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2648">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2649">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2649">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2650">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2650">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2702">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2702">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2703">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2703">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2704">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2704">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2705">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2705">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2706">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2706">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2707">등록 코드에 해당하는 abcdefghjklmnprstux 중 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2707">One letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2708">등록자 성의 첫 문자에 해당하는 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2708">One letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2709">검사 숫자의 마지막 7개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2709">Seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2710">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2710">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2711">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2711">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2712">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2712">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2713">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2713">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2714">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2714">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2715">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2715">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2716">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2716">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2717">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2717">None</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2718">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2718">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2719">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2719">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2720">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2721">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2721">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2722">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2723">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2723">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2724">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2724">The letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2725">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2725">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2726">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2727">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2727">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2728">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2729">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2729">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2730">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2730">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2731">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2731">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2732">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2732">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2733">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2733">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2737">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2737">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2738">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2738">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2739">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2739">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2740">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2740">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2741">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2741">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2742">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2742">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2743">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2743">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2744">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2744">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2745">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2745">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2746">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2746">permis de conduire</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2747">에스토니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2747">Estonia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2748">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2748">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2749">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2749">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2750">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2750">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2751">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2751">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2752">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2752">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2753">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2753">One digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2754">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2754">Six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2755">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2755">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2756">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2756">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2757">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2757">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2758">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2758">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2759">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2759">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2760">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2760">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2761">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2761">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2762">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2762">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2763">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2763">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2764">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2764">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2797">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2797">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2798">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2798">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2799">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2799">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2800">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2800">One letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2801">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2801">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2802">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2802">One letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2803">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2804">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2804">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2805">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2806">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2806">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2807">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2807">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2808">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2808">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2809">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2809">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2810">**Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2810">**Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2811">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2811">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2812">에스토니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2812">estonian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2813">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2813">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2814">eesti kodaniku pass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2814">eesti kodaniku pass</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2815">에스토니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2815">Estonia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2816">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2816">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2817">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2817">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2818">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2818">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2819">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2819">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2820">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2820">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2821">성별에 해당 하는 숫자와 홀수로 해당 하 고, 홀수를 지정 하 여 19th 세기에 대해 1, 2를 나타내는 숫자입니다. 3, 20th 세기에 대해 4를 적용 합니다. 21 세기에 대해 5, 6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2821">One digit that corresponds to gender and century of birth where an odd number indicates male and the even number indicates female as follows: 1, 2 for the 19th century; 3, 4 for the 20th century; and 5, 6 for the 21st century</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2822">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2822">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2823">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2823">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2824">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2824">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2825">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2825">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2826">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2826">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2827">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2827">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2828">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2828">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2829">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2829">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2830">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2830">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2831">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2831">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2832">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2832">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2865">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2865">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2866">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2866">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2867">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2867">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2868">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2868">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2869">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2869">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2870">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2870">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2871">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2871">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-2872">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2872">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-2873">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2873">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2874">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2874">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2875">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2875">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2876">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2876">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2877">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2877">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2878">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2878">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2879">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2879">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2880">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2880">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2881">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2881">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2896">amex</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2896">amex</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2897">atm card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2897">atm card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-2904">bancontact</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-2904">bancontact</span></span>

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3327">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3327">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3328">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3328">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3329">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3330">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3330">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3331">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3332">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3332">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3333">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3333">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3334">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3334">A hyphen</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3335">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3335">Four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3336">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3337">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3337">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3338">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3339">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3339">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3340">정규식이 해당  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3340">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3341">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3341">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3342">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3342">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3343">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3343">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3344">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3344">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3345">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3345">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3346">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3346">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3347">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3347">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3348">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3348">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3349">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3349">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3350">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3350">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3351">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3351">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3352">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3352">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3353">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3353">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3354">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3354">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3355">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3355">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3356">ajokortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3356">ajokortti</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3357">핀란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3357">Finland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3358">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3358">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3359">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3359">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3360">세기를 나타내는 6자리 숫자와 문자, 3자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3360">Six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3361">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3361">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3362">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3362">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3363">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3363">Six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3364">세기 표시('-', '+' 또는 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3364">Century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3365">3자리 개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3365">Three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3366">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3366">A digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3367">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3367">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3368">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3368">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3369">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3369">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3370">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3370">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3371">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3371">The function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3372">Keyword_finnish_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3372">A keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3373">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3373">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finnish National ID-->
<Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3375">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3375">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3383">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3384">identiteetti numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3384">identiteetti numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3385">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3385">identity number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3388">kansallisen henkilökortin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3388">kansallisen henkilökortin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3389">국가 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3389">national id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3390">국가 id 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3390">national id no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3391">개인 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3391">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3392">개인 id 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3392">personal identity code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3394">personbeteckning</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3394">personbeteckning</span></span>
