## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3422">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3422">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3423">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3423">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3424">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3424">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3425">9개의 문자와 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3425">Combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3426">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3426">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3427">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합: 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3427">Combination of nine letters and digits: Two letters (not case sensitive) Seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3428">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3428">Checksum</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3429">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3429">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3430">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3430">Definition</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3431">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3431">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3432">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3432">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3433">Keyword_finland_passport_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3433">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3434">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3434">Keywords</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3435">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3435">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3436">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3436">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3437">에이 si</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3437">Passi</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3438">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3438">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3439">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3439">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3440">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3441">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3441">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3442">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3443">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3443">An 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3444">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3444">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3445">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3445">One instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3446">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3446">Plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3447">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3447">Minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3448">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3448">The letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3449">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3449">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3450">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3450">One letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3451">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3452">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3452">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3453">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3454">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3454">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3455">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3455">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3456">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3456">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3457">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3457">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3458">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3458">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3459">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3459">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3460">Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3460">Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3469">국가 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3469">national id number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3477">henkilötunnusnumero #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3477">henkilötunnusnumero#</span></span>

## <a name="finland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3482">핀란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3482">Finland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3483">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3483">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3484">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3485">숫자, 문자, 더하기 및 빼기 기호를 11 문자로 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3485">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3486">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3487">숫자, 문자, 더하기 및 빼기 기호를 11 문자로 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3487">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3488">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3488">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3489">더하기 기호, 빼기 기호 또는 + 기호가 1800-1899 사이에 태어난 것을 의미 하는 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 빼기 기호는 1900-1999 사이에 출생를 의미 하며 "A"는 "A"를 2000 의미 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3489">One of the following: a plus sign, a minus sign, or the letter "A" (not case sensitive) where the plus sign means born between 1800-1899, the minus sign means born between 1900-1999, and "A" means born 2000 and after</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3490">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3490">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3491">1 개의 문자 또는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3491">One letter or one number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3492">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3492">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3493">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3493">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3494">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3494">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3495">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3495">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3496">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3496">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3497">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3497">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3498">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3498">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3499">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3499">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3550">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3550">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3551">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3551">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3552">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3553">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3553">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3554">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3555">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3555">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3556">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3556">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3557">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3557">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3558">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3558">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3559">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3559">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3560">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3560">The function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3561">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3561">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3562">Keyword_french_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3562">A keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3563">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3563">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3564">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3564">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3568">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3568">driving licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3569">driving license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3569">driving license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3570">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3570">permis de conduire</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3573">licence numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3573">licence numbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3574">license numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3574">license numbers</span></span>

## <a name="france-national-identification-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3575">프랑스 국가 식별 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3575">France national identification card (CNI)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3576">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3576">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3577">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3578">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3578">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3579">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3580">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3580">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3581">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3582">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3582">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3583">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3584">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3584">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3585">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3585">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France CNI -->
<Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3587">card number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3587">card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3588">carte nationale d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3588">carte nationale d’identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3589">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3589">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3595">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3595">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3596">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3596">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3597">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3597">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3598">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3598">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3599">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3599">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3600">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3600">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3601">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3601">Nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3602">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3602">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3603">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3603">Nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3604">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3604">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3605">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3605">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3606">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3606">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3607">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3608">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3609">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3610">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3610">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3611">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3611">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3612">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3612">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3613">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3613">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3614">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3614">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3615">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3615">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3616">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3616">Passport No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3617">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3617">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3618">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3618">Passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3619">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3619">PassportID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3620">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3620">Passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3621">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3621">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3622">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3622">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3623">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3623">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3624">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3624">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3625">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3625">パスポート ＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3626">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3626">Numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3627">Passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3627">Passeport n °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3628">Passeport Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3628">Passeport Non</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3629">Passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3629">Passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3630">포트 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3630">Passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3631">지/포트 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3631">PasseportNon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3632">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3632">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3633">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3633">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3634">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3634">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3635">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3635">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3636">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3636">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3637">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3637">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3638">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3638">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3639">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3639">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3640">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3640">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3641">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3641">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3642">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3642">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3643">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3643">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3644">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3644">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3645">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3645">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3646">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3646">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3647">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3647">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3648">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3648">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3649">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3649">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3650">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3650">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3651">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3651">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3652">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3652">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3653">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3653">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3654">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3654">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3655">insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3655">insee</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3656">securité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3656">securité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3657">securite sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3657">securite sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3658">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3658">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3659">national identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3659">national identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3660">numéro d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3660">numéro d'identité</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3662">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3662">no.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3663">d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3663">d'identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3664">numero d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3664">numero d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3665">no d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3665">no d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3666">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3666">no.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3667">d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3667">d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3668">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3668">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3669">social security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3669">social security code</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3671">le numéro d'identification nationale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3671">le numéro d'identification nationale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3672">d'identité nationale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3672">d'identité nationale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3673">numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3673">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3674">le code de la sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3674">le code de la sécurité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3675">numéro d'assurance sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3675">numéro d'assurance sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3676">numéro de sécu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3676">numéro de sécu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3677">code sécu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3677">code sécu</span></span> 

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3678">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3678">France tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3679">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3679">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3680">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3680">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3681">개별 사용자의 경우 13 자리 숫자 및 엔터티의 경우 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3681">13 digits for individuals and nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3682">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3682">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3683">개별 사용자에 대 한 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3683">13 digits for individuals:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3684">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3684">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3685">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3685">12 digits</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3686">엔터티의 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3686">Nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3687">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3687">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3688">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3688">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3689">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3689">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3690">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3690">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3691">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3691">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3692">From 키워드를  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3692">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3693">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3693">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3694">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3694">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3714">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3714">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3715">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3715">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3716">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3717">11자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3717">Combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3718">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3718">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3719">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3719">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3720">1자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3720">A digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3721">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3721">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3722">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3722">Six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3723">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3723">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3724">1자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3724">A digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3725">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3726">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3726">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3727">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3728">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3728">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3729">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3729">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3730">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3730">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3731">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3731">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3732">Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3732">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3733">Keyword_german_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3733">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3734">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3734">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3827">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3827">Germany identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3828">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3828">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3829">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID에 해당 하는 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3829">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3830">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3830">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3831">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3831">Since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3832">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3832">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3833">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3834">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3834">Since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3835">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3835">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3836">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3836">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3837">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3837">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3838">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3838">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3839">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3840">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3840">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3841">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3842">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3842">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3843">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3843">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3844">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3844">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3845">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3845">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3846">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3846">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3847">ausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3847">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3848">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3848">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3849">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3849">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3850">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3850">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3851">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3851">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3852">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3852">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3853">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3853">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3854">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3854">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3855">개인 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3855">personal id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3857">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3857">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3858">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3858">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3860">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3860">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3861">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3861">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3862">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3863">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3863">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3864">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3865">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3865">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3866">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는 (C, F, G, H, J, K) 집합의 문자임</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3866">First character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3867">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3867">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3868">5자리 숫자 또는 (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z) 집합의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3868">Five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3869">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3869">A digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3870">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3870">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3871">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3871">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3872">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3872">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3873">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3873">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3874">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3874">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3875">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3875">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3876">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3876">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3877">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3877">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3878">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3878">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3879">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3879">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3880">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3880">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3898">독일 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3898">Germany tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3899">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3899">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3900">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3900">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3901">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3901">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3902">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3902">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3903">11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3903">11 digits :</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3904">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3904">Ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3905">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3905">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3906">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3907">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3907">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3908">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3909">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3909">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3910">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3910">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3911">From 키워드를  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3911">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3912">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3912">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3913">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3913">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3939">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3939">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3940">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3940">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3941">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3941">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3942">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3942">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3943">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3943">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3944">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3944">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3945">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3945">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3946">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3946">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3947">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3947">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3948">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3948">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3949">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3949">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3950">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3950">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3951">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3951">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3952">**Keywords_greece_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3952">**Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3955">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3955">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3956">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3956">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3957">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3957">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3958">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3958">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3959">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3959">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3960">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3960">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3961">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3961">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3962">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3962">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3963">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3963">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3964">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3964">dlno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3966">Adeia odigisis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3966">Adeia odigisis</span></span>


## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3967">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3967">Greece National ID Card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3968">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3968">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3969">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3970">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3970">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3971">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3971">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3972">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3972">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3973">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3973">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3974">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3974">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3975">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3975">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3976">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3976">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3977">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3977">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3978">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3978">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3979">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3979">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3980">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3981">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3981">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3982">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3983">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3983">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3984">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3984">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3985">Keyword_greece_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3985">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Greece National ID Card -->
<Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3986">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3986">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3987">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3987">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3988">그리스 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3988">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3989">그리스 국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3989">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3990">그리스어 개인 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3990">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3991">그리스 경찰서 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3991">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3992">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3992">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3993">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3993">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3994">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3994">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-3995">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3995">ταυτότητας</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3996">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3996">Greece passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3997">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3997">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-3998">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3998">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-3999">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-3999">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4000">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4000">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4001">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4001">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4002">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4002">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4003">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4003">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4004">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4004">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4005">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4005">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4006">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4006">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4007">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4007">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4008">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4008">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4009">**Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4009">**Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4010">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4010">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4011">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4011">greek passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4012">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4012">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4013">διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4013">διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4014">그리스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4014">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4015">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4015">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4016">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4016">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4017">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4017">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4018">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4018">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4019">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4019">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4020">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4020">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4021">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4021">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4022">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4022">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4023">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4023">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4024">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4024">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4025">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4025">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4054">HKID (홍콩 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4054">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4055">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4055">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4056">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4056">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4057">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4057">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4058">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4058">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4059">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4059">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4060">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4060">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4061">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4061">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4062">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4063">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4063">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4064">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4065">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4065">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4066">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4066">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4067">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4067">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4068">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4068">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4069">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4069">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4070">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4070">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4071">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4071">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4102">香港非永久性居民身分証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4102">香港非永久性居民身分証</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4104">香港特別行政區永久性居民身份証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4104">香港特別行政區永久性居民身份証</span></span>
