## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4599">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4599">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4600">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4600">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4601">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4601">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4602">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4602">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4603">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4603">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4604">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4604">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4605">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4605">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4606">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4606">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4607">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4607">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4608">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4608">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4609">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4609">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4610">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4610">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4611">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4611">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4612">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4612">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4613">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4613">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4614">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4614">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4615">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4615">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4616">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4616">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4617">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4617">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4618">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4618">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4619">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4619">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4620">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4620">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4621">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4621">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4622">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4622">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4623">이스라엘 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4623">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4624">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4624">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4625">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4625">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4626">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4626">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4627">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4627">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4628">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4628">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4629">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4629">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4630">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4630">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4631">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4631">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4632">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4632">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4633">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4633">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4634">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4634">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4635">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4635">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4636">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4636">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4637">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4637">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4638">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4638">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4639">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4639">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4640">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4640">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4641">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4641">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4642">10개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4642">A combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4643">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4643">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4644">10개의 문자 및 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4644">A combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4645">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4645">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4646">문자 "A" 또는 "V"(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4646">The letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4647">7개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자 또는 밑줄 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4647">Seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4648">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4648">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4649">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4649">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4650">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4650">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4651">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4651">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4652">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4652">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4653">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4653">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4654">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4654">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4655">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4655">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4656">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4656">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4657">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4657">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4658">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4658">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4659">이탈리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4659">Italy national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4660">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4660">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4661">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4662">지정 된 패턴에 해당 하는 문자 및 숫자의 16 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4662">A 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4663">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4664">문자와 숫자의 16 자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4664">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4665">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4665">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4666">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4666">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4667">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4667">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4668">출생 월의 문자에 해당 하는 한 문자는 알파벳 순서로 사용 되지만 1 ~ E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자를 사용 하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4668">One letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4669">Genders를 구분 하기 위해 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자 (40)가 여성 생년월일에 추가 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4669">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4670">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (국가 전체 코드는 외국 국가에 사용 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4670">Four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4671">1 개의 패리티 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4671">One parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4672">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4672">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4673">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4673">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4674">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4674">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4675">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4675">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4676">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4676">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4677">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4677">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4678">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4678">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4679">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4679">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Italy national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4714">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4714">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4715">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4715">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4716">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4717">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4717">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4718">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4718">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4719">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4719">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4720">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4720">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4721">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4721">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4722">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4723">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4723">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4724">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4725">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4725">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4726">정규식이 해당  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4726">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4727">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4727">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4728">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4728">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4729">**Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4729">**Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4730">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4730">italian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4731">repubblica italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4731">repubblica italiana passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4732">passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4732">passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4733">passaporto italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4733">passaporto italiana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4734">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4734">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4735">italiana passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4735">italiana passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4736">passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4736">passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4737">numéro) 포트 italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4737">numéro passeport italien</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4738">numéro (고) 포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4738">numéro passeport</span></span>

## <a name="italy-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4739">이탈리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4739">Italy tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4740">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4740">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4741">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4742">지정 된 패턴의 문자와 숫자 16 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4742">16 letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4743">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4743">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4744">16 자의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4744">16 letters and digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4745">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4745">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4746">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4746">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4747">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4747">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4748">출생 달에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자는 알파벳 순으로 사용 되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자만 사용 되며, 따라서 1 월은 A와 10 월이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4748">One digit that corresponds to the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4749">남성의와 구별 하기 위해 여성의 경우 짝수에서 출생 일에 40이 추가 되는 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4749">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth where 40 is added to the day of birth for females to differentiate from males</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4750">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자-국가 전체 코드를 외국 국가에 사용 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4750">Four digits that correspond to an area code specific to the municipality where the person was born—country-wide codes are used for foreign countries</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4751">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4751">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4752">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4752">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4753">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4753">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4754">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4754">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4755">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4755">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4756">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4756">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4757">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4757">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4758">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4758">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4759">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4759">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4794">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4794">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4795">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4796">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4796">Seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4797">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4798">은행 계좌 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4798">Bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4799">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4799">Seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4800">은행 계좌 지점 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4800">Bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4801">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4801">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4802">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4802">A space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4803">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4803">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4804">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4805">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4805">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4806">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4807">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4807">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4808">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4808">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4809">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4809">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4810">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4810">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4811">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4811">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4812">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4812">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4813">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4813">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4814">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4814">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4815">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4815">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4827">Bank Account #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4827">Bank Account #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4828">Bank Acct Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4828">Bank Acct Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4830">Bank Acct No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4830">Bank Acct No.</span></span>

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4874">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4874">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4875">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4875">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4876">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4876">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4877">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4877">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4878">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4878">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4879">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4879">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4880">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4880">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4881">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4881">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4882">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4882">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4883">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4883">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4884">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4884">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4912">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4912">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4913">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4913">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4914">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4914">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4915">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4915">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4916">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4916">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4917">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4917">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4918">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4918">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4919">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4919">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4920">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4920">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4921">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4921">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4922">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4922">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4923">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4923">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4924">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4924">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4929">일본 거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4929">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4930">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4930">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4931">12 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4931">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4932">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4932">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4933">12 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4933">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4934">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4934">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4935">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4935">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4936">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4936">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4937">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4937">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4938">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4938">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4939">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4939">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4940">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4940">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4941">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4941">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4942">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4942">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4943">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4943">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4944">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4944">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4945">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4945">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4946">거주지 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4946">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4947">거주지 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4947">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4948">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4948">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4949">일본 상주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4949">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4950">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4950">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4951">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4951">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4952">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4952">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4953">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4953">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4954">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4955">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4955">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4956">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4957">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4957">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4958">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4958">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4959">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4959">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4960">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4960">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4961">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4961">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4962">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4962">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4963">Resident Register Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4963">Resident Register Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4964">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4964">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4965">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4965">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4966">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4966">Resident Register No.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4968">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4968">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4969">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4969">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4970">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4970">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4971">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4971">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span></span>

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4973">일본 SIN (사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4973">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4974">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4975">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4975">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4976">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4977">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4977">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4978">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4978">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4979">하이픈 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4979">A hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4980">6 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4980">Six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4981">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4981">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4982">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4982">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4983">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4983">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4984">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4984">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4985">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4985">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4986">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4986">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4987">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4987">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4988">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4988">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4989">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4989">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4990">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4990">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4991">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4991">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4992">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4992">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4993">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4993">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4994">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4994">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4995">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4995">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4996">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4996">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-4997">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4997">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-4998">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4998">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-4999">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-4999">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5000">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5000">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5001">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5001">Three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5002">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5002">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5003">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5003">Three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5004">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5004">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5005">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5005">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5006">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5007">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5007">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5008">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5009">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5009">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5010">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5010">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5011">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5011">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5012">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5012">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5013">**Keywords_latvia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5013">**Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5014">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5014">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5017">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5017">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5018">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5018">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5019">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5019">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5020">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5020">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5021">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5021">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5022">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5022">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5023">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5023">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5024">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5024">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5025">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5025">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5026">autovadītāja apliecība</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5026">autovadītāja apliecība</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5027">라트비아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5027">Latvia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5028">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5028">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5029">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5029">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5030">지정 된 형식의 11 자리 숫자 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5030">11 digits and a hyphen in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5031">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5031">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5032">11 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5032">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5033">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5033">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5034">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5034">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5035">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (19th 세기의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5035">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5036">임의로 생성 되는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5036">Four digits, randomly generated</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5037">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5037">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5038">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5038">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5039">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5039">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5040">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5040">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5041">이 함수는 해당  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5041">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5042">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5042">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5043">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5043">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5044">이 함수는 해당  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5044">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Latvia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5107">라트비아, 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5107">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5108">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5108">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5109">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5110">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5110">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5111">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5111">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5112">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5112">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5113">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5113">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5114">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5114">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5115">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5116">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5116">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5117">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5118">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5118">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5119">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5119">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5120">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5120">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5121">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5121">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5122">**Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5122">**Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5123">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5123">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5124">라트비아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5124">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5125">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5125">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5126">pase numurs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5126">pase numurs</span></span>    

## <a name="latvia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5127">라트비아 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5127">Latvia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5128">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5128">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5129">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5129">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5130">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5130">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5131">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5131">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5132">지정 된 패턴에서 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5132">11 digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5133">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5133">Six digits that correspond to the date of birth (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5134">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 이며, "0"은 19th 세기에 해당 하 고 "1"은 20th 세기에 해당 하며 21 세기에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5134">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth where "0" corresponds to 19th century, "1" corresponds to 20th century, and "2"corresponds to 21st century</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5135">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5135">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5136">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5136">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5137">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5137">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5138">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5138">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5139">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5139">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5140">이 함수는 해당  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5140">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5141">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5141">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5142">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5143">이 함수는 해당  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5143">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5206">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5206">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5207">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5207">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5208">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5209">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5209">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5210">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5210">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5211">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5211">Eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5212">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5212">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5213">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5213">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5214">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5214">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5215">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5215">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5216">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5216">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5217">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5217">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5219">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5219">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5222">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5222">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5223">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5223">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5224">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5224">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5225">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5225">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5226">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5226">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5227">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5227">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5228">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5228">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5229">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5229">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5230">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5230">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5232">vairuotojo pažymėjimas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5232">vairuotojo pažymėjimas</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5233">리투아니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5233">Lithuania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5234">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5234">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5235">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5235">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5236">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5236">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5237">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5237">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5238">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5238">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5239">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5239">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5240">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5240">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5241">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5241">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5242">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5242">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5243">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5244">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5244">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5245">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5246">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5246">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5247">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5247">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5248">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5248">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5249">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5250">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5250">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Lithuania national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
