## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5285">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5285">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5286">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5286">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5287">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5287">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5288">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5288">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5289">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5289">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5290">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5290">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5291">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5292">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5292">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5293">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5294">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5295">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5295">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5296">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5296">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5297">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5297">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5298">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5298">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5299">여권 번호 lithunian 여권 번호 passport 암호 없음 o numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5299">passport number lithunian passport number passport no paso numeris</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5300">리투아니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5300">Lithuania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5301">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5301">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5302">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5303">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5303">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5304">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5305">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5305">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5306">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5306">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5307">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5307">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5308">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5308">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5309">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5309">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5310">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5310">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5311">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5311">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5312">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5312">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5313">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5313">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5347">룩셈부르크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5347">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5348">중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5348">his sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5349">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5349">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5350">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5350">Six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5351">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5351">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5352">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5352">Six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5353">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5353">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5354">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5354">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5355">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5355">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5356">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5356">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5357">정규식이 해당  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5357">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5358">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5358">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5359">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5359">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5360">**Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5360">**Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5361">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5361">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5362">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5362">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5363">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5363">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5364">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5364">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5365">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5365">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5366">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5366">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5367">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5367">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5368">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5368">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5369">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5369">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5370">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5370">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5371">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5371">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5372">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5372">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5373">fahrerlaubnis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5373">fahrerlaubnis</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5374">룩셈부르크 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5374">Luxemburg national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5375">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5375">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5376">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5377">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5377">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5378">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5379">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5379">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5380">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5380">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5381">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5381">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5382">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5382">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5383">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5383">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5384">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5385">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5385">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5386">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5387">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5387">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5388">정규식이 해당  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5388">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5389">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5389">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5412">룩셈부르크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5412">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5413">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5413">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5414">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5414">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5415">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5415">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5416">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5416">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5417">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5417">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5418">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5418">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5419">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5419">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5420">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5420">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5421">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5421">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5422">정규식이 해당  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5422">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5423">From 키워드를  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5423">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5424">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5424">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5425">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5425">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5426">여권 번호 라트비아어 여권 passport 번호 passport passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5426">passport number latvian passport number passport no passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5427">룩셈부르크 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5427">Luxemburg tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5428">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5428">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5429">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5429">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5430">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5430">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5431">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5431">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5432">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5432">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5433">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5433">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5434">2개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5434">Two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5435">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5436">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5436">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5437">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5438">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5438">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5439">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5439">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5440">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5440">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5441">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5441">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5442">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5442">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5482">말레이시아 식별 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5482">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5483">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5484">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5484">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5485">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5486">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5486">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5487">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5487">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5488">대시(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5488">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5489">2개 문자로 이루어진 출생지 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5489">Two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5490">대시(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5490">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5491">임의의 3자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5491">Three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5492">1자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5492">One-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5493">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5493">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5494">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5494">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5495">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5495">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5496">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5496">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5497">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5497">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5498">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5498">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5517">mykas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5517">mykas</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5520">myta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5520">mytentera</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5521">말레이시아 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5521">malaysia identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5522">말레이지아 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5522">malaysian identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5523">nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5523">nric</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5524">개인 식별 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5524">personal identification card</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5525">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5525">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5526">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5526">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5527">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5528">지정 된 패턴에서 두 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5528">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5529">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5530">두 문자와 6 자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5530">Combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5531">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5531">Two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5532">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5532">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5533">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5533">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5534">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5534">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5535">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5535">Three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5536">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5536">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5537">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5537">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5538">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5538">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5539">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5539">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5540">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5540">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5541">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5541">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5543">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5543">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5545">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5545">driver license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5547">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5547">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5548">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5548">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5553">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5553">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5554">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5554">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5557">몰타 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5557">Malta national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5558">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5558">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5559">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5559">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5560">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5560">Seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5561">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5561">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5562">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5562">Seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5563">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5563">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5564">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5564">One uppercase letter (case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5565">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5566">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5566">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5567">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5568">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5569">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5569">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5570">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5570">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5571">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5571">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5572">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5572">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Malta national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5578">kodiċi numerali personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5578">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5579">numru ta ' personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5579">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5580">numru ta ' taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5580">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5581">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5581">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5582">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5582">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5583">numru taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5583">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5584">numru tat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5584">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5585">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5585">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5586">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5586">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5587">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5587">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5588">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5588">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5589">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5589">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5590">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5590">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5591">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5591">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5592">공백이 나 구분 기호 없이 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5592">Seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5593">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5593">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5594">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5594">Seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5595">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5596">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5596">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5597">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5598">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5598">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5599">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5599">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5600">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5600">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5601">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5601">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5602">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5602">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5603">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5603">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5604">몰타어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5604">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5605">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5605">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5606">numru-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5606">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5607">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5607">Malta tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5608">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5608">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5609">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5610">몰타어 nationals의 경우 지정 된 패턴의 7 자리 및 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5610">For Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5611">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5611">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5612">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5613">몰타어 nationals: 7 자리 숫자 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5613">Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5614">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5614">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5615">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5615">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5616">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5616">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5617">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5617">Nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5618">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5619">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5619">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5620">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5621">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5621">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5622">이 함수는 해당  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5622">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5623">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5623">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5624">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5624">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5625">이 함수는 해당  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5625">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5658">네덜란드 시민 서비스 (BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5658">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5659">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5660">선택적으로 공백을 포함하는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5660">8-9 digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5661">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5662">8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5662">8-9 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5663">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5663">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5664">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5664">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5665">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5665">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5666">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5666">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5667">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5667">2-3 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5668">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5669">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5669">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5670">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5671">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5671">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5672">Func_netherlands_bsn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5672">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5673">Keyword_netherlands_bsn에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5673">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5674">Func_eu_date2 함수는 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5674">The function Func_eu_date2 finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5675">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5675">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
<Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Keyword_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Func_eu_date2" /> 
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5699">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5699">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5700">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5700">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5701">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5701">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5702">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5702">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5703">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5703">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5704">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5704">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5705">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5705">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5706">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5706">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5707">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5707">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5708">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5708">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5709">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5709">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5710">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5710">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5711">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5711">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5712">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5712">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5716">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5716">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5722">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5722">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5723">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5723">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5728">네덜란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5728">Netherlands national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5729">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5729">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5730">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5730">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5731">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5731">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5732">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5732">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5733">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5733">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5734">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5735">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5735">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5736">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5737">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5737">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5738">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5738">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5739">From 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5739">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5740">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5740">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5741">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5741">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Netherland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5765">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5765">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5766">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5766">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5767">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5767">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5768">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5768">Nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5769">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5769">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5770">9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5770">Nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5771">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5771">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5772">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5772">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5773">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5773">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5774">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5774">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5775">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5775">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5776">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5776">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5777">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5777">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5779">네덜란드어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5779">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5780">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5780">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5781">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5781">netherlands passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5782">nederlanden, nummer ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5782">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5783">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5783">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5784">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5784">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5785">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5785">paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5786">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5786">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5787">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5787">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5788">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5788">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5789">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5789">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5790">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5790">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5791">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5791">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5792">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5792">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5793">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5793">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5794">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5794">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5795">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5795">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5796">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5796">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5797">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5797">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5798">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5798">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5799">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5799">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5837">뉴질랜드 보건부 (생명 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5837">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5838">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5838">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5839">3개 문자, 공백 1개(선택 사항) 및 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5839">Three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5840">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5840">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5841">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 공백 (선택 사항) 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5841">Three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5842">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5842">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5843">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5843">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5844">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5844">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5845">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5845">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5846">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5846">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5847">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5847">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5848">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5848">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5849">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5849">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5850">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5850">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5851">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5851">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5852">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5852">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5853">상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5853">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5854">처리가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5854">treatment</span></span> 
   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5855">노르웨이 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5855">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5856">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5856">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5857">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5857">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5858">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5858">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5859">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5859">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5860">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5860">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5861">3자리 개인 번호 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5861">Three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5862">2개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5862">Two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5863">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5863">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5864">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5864">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5865">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5865">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5866">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5866">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5867">Func_norway_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5867">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5868">Keyword_norway_id_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5868">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5869">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5869">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5870">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5870">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5871">Func_norway_id_numbe 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5871">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5872">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5872">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5881">필리핀 통합 다목적 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5881">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5882">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5882">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5883">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5883">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5884">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5884">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5885">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5885">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5886">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5886">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5887">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5887">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5888">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5888">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5889">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5889">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5890">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5890">One digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5891">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5891">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5892">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5892">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5893">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5893">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5894">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5894">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5895">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5895">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5896">Keyword_philippines_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5896">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5897">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5897">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5898">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5898">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5899">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5899">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5900">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5900">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5901">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5901">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5902">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5902">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5903">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5903">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5904">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5904">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5905">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5905">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5906">두 개의 슬래시를 포함 하는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5906">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5907">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5908">14 자리 숫자와 2 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5908">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5909">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5909">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5910">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5910">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5911">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5911">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5912">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5912">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5913">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5913">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5914">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5914">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5915">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5915">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5916">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5916">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5917">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5917">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5918">정규식이 해당  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5918">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5919">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5919">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5920">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5920">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5921">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5921">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5922">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5922">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5923">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5923">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5924">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5924">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5925">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5925">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5926">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5926">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5927">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5927">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5928">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5928">drivers licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5930">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5930">driver's license number</span></span>
