## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5935">폴란드 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5935">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5936">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5936">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5937">3개의 문자 및 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5937">Three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5938">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5938">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5939">3개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5939">Three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5940">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5941">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5941">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5942">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5943">DLP 정책은 300 Func_polish_national_id 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5944">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5944">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5945">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5945">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5946">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5946">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5947">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5947">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5948">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5948">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5949">U r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5949">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5950">Nazwa i u r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5950">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5951">Nazwa i veiligheid dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5951">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5952">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5952">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5953">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5953">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5954">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5954">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5955">르.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5955">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5956">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5956">Poland National ID (PESEL)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5957">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5957">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5958">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5959">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5959">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5960">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5961">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5961">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5962">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5962">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5963">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5963">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5964">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5964">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5965">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5965">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5966">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5966">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5967">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5967">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5968">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5968">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->      
<Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5969">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5969">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5970">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5970">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5971">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5971">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5972">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5972">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5973">niepowtarzalny u r i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5973">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5974">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5974">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5975">veiligheid.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5975">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5976">veiligheid-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5976">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5977">u r i identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5977">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5978">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5978">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5979">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5979">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5980">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5980">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5981">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5981">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5982">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5983">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5983">Two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5984">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5985">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5985">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5986">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5987">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5987">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5988">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-5989">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5989">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5990">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5990">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5991">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5991">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5992">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5992">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5993">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5993">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5994">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5994">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5995">U r i (zportu)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5995">Numer paszportu</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-5998">고 zport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5998">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-5999">폴란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-5999">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6000">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6000">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6001">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6002">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6002">Eleven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6003">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6003">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6004">11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6004">Eleven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6005">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6005">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6006">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6006">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6007">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6007">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6008">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6008">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6009">이 함수는 해당  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6009">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6010">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6010">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6011">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6012">이 함수는 해당  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6012">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6013">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6013">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6014">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6014">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6015">nip #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6015">nip#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6016">nip</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6016">nip</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6017">u r i identyfikacji podatkowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6017">numer identyfikacji podatkowej</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6018">numeridentyfikacjipodatkowej #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6018">numeridentyfikacjipodatkowej#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6019">tax id

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6042">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6042">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6043">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6043">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6044">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID에 해당 하는 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6044">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6045">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6045">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6046">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6046">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6047">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6047">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6048">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6048">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6049">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6049">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6050">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6050">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6051">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6051">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6052">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6052">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6053">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6053">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6054">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6054">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6055">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6055">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_portugal_citizen_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6056">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6056">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6060">문서 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6060">document number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6061">documento de identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6061">documento de identificação</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6062">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6062">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6063">id 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6063">identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6064">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6064">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6065">id 카드 번호 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6065">identity card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6066">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6066">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6067">국가 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6067">national id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6068">nic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6068">nic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6069">número bi de 포르투갈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6069">número bi de portugal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6070">número de identificação 민사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6070">número de identificação civil</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6071">número de identificação 회계</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6071">número de identificação fiscal</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6074">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6074">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6075">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6075">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6076">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6076">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6077">두 개의 문자와 지정 된 패턴에 있는 일곱 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6077">Two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6078">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6078">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6079">두 문자 다음에 특수 문자를 사용한 7 개의 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6079">Two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6080">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6080">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6081">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6081">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6082">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6082">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6083">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6083">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6084">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6084">One digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6085">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6085">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6086">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6086">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6087">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6087">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6088">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6088">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6089">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6089">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6090">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6090">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6091">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6091">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6092">**Keywords_portugal_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6092">**Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6095">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6095">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6096">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6096">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6097">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6097">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6098">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6098">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6099">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6099">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6100">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6100">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6101">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6101">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6102">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6102">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6103">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6103">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6104">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6104">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6105">carteira de motorista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6105">carteira de motorista</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6106">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6106">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6107">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6107">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6108">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6108">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6109">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6109">One letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6110">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6110">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6111">1 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6111">One letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6112">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6112">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6113">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6113">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6114">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6114">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6115">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6115">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6116">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6116">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6117">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6117">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6118">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6118">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6119">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6119">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6120">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6120">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6121">**Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6121">**Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6122">여권 번호 포르투갈어 passport 번호 passport número do passaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6122">passport number portuguese passport number passport no número do passaporte</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6123">포르투갈 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6123">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6124">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6124">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6125">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6125">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6126">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6126">Nine digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6127">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6127">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6128">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6128">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6129">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6129">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6130">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6130">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6131">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6131">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6132">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6132">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6133">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6133">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6134">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6134">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6135">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6135">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6136">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6136">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6161">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6161">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6162">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6162">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6163">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6164">한 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6164">One character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6165">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6166">1 개의 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6166">One character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6167">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6167">One letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6168">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6168">Eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6169">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6170">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6171">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6172">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6172">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6173">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6173">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6174">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6174">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6180">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6180">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6181">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6181">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6183">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6183">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6184">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6184">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6185">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6185">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6186">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6186">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6187">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6187">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="romania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6190">루마니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6190">Romania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6191">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6191">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6192">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6192">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6193">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6193">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6194">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6194">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6195">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6195">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6196">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6196">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6197">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6197">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6198">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6198">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6199">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6199">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6200">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6200">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6201">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6201">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6202">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6202">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6203">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6203">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Romania national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6204">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6204">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6254">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6254">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6255">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6255">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6256">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6256">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6257">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6257">Eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6258">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6258">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6259">8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6259">Eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6260">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6260">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6261">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6261">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6262">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6262">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6263">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6263">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6264">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6264">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6265">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6265">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6266">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6266">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6267">**Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6267">**Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6268">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6268">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6269">루마니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6269">romanian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6270">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6270">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6271">numărul pașaportului</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6271">numărul pașaportului</span></span>

## <a name="romania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6272">루마니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6272">Romania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6273">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6273">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6274">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6274">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6275">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6275">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6276">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6276">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6277">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6277">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6278">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6279">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6279">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6280">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6281">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6281">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6282">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6282">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6283">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6283">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6334">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6334">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6335">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6335">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6336">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6336">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6337">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6337">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6338">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6338">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6339">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6339">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6340">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6340">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6341">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6341">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6342">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6342">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6343">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6343">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6344">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6344">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6345">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6345">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6349">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6349">ID number</span></span>

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6351">싱가포르 NRIC (국가 등록 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6351">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6352">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6353">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6353">Nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6354">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6354">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6355">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6355">Nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6356">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6356">The letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6357">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6357">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6358">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6358">An alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6359">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6360">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6360">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6361">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6362">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6363">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6363">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6364">Keyword_singapore_nric에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6364">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6365">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6365">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6366">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6366">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6367">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6367">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6368">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6368">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6379">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6379">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6380">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6380">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6381">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6381">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6382">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6382">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6383">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6383">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6384">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6384">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6385">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6385">One letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6386">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6386">Seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6387">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6387">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6388">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6388">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6389">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6389">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6390">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6390">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6391">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6391">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6392">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6392">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6393">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6393">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6394">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6394">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6395">dl # driver license driver 면허 번호 드라이버 라이선스 드라이버 lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6395">dl# driver license driver license number driver licence drivers lic.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6396">drivers license driver 면허 드라이버의 라이선스 드라이버 라이선스 번호 운전 면허 번호 라이센스 번호 제어 # vodičský preukaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6396">drivers license drivers licence driver's license driver's license number driver's licence number driving license number dlno# vodičský preukaz</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6397">슬로바키아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6397">Slovakia national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6399">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6399">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6400">백슬래시 하나를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6400">Ten digits containing one backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6401">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6401">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6402">백슬래시 하나를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6402">Ten digits containing one backslash:</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6403">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6403">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6404">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6404">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6405">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6405">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6406">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6406">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6407">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6407">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6408">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6408">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6409">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6409">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6410">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6410">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovakia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />

          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6412">Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6412">Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6457">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6457">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6458">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6458">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6459">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6459">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6460">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자 다음에 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6460">One digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6461">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6461">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6462">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6462">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6463">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6464">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6464">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6465">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6466">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6466">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6467">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6467">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6468">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6468">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6469">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6469">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6470">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6470">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6471">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6471">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6472">슬로바키아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6472">slovakian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6473">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6473">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6474">číslo (u)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6474">číslo pasu</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6475">슬로바키아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6475">Slovakia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6476">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6476">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6477">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6477">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6478">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6478">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6479">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6479">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6480">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6480">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6481">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6482">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6482">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6483">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6484">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6484">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6485">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6485">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6486">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6486">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6533">슬로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6533">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6534">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6534">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6535">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6536">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6536">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6537">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6537">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6538">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6538">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6539">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6540">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6540">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6541">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6542">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6542">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6543">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6543">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6544">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6544">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6545">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6545">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6546">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6546">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6547">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6547">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6548">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6548">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6549">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6549">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6550">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6550">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6551">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6551">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6552">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6552">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6553">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6553">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6554">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6554">driver's license</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6555">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6555">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6556">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6556">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6557">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6557">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6558">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6558">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6559">vozniško dovoljenje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6559">vozniško dovoljenje</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6560">슬로베니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6560">Slovenia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6561">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6561">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6562">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6562">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6563">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6563">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6564">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6564">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6565">지정 된 패턴의 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6565">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6566">생년월일 (DDMMLLL)에 해당 하는 7 자리 숫자 이며 "LLL"은 출생 연도의 마지막 세 자리에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6566">Seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6567">출생 면적에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6567">Two digits that correspond to the area of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6568">같은 날에 태어난 사용자의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자 (남성는 000-499, 암은 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6568">Three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6569">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6569">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6570">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6570">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6571">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6571">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6572">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6572">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6573">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6573">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6574">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6574">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6575">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6575">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6576">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6576">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6577">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6577">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovenia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
