## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6605">슬로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6605">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6606">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6606">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6607">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6607">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6608">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6608">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6609">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6609">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6610">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6610">Two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6611">"P" 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6611">The letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6612">대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6612">One uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6613">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6613">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6614">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6614">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6615">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6615">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6616">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6616">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6617">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6617">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6618">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6618">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6619">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6619">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6620">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6620">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6621">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6621">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6622">여권 번호 슬로베니아어 여권 번호 passport no številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6622">passport number slovenian passport number passport no številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6623">슬로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6623">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6624">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6624">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6625">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6626">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6626">Eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6627">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6628">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6628">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6629">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6629">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6630">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6630">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6631">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6631">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6632">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6632">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6633">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6633">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6634">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6634">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6635">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6635">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6636">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6636">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6660">남아프리카 공화국 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6660">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6661">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6662">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6662">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6663">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6664">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6664">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6665">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6665">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6666">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6666">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6667">1자리 시민권 표시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6667">A single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6668">숫자 "8" 또는 "9" </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6668">The digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6669">체크섬 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6669">One digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6670">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6671">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6671">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6672">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6673">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6673">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6674">Func_south_africa_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6674">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6675">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6675">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6676">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6676">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6677">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6677">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6678">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6678">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6682">대한민국 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6682">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6683">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6684">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6684">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6685">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6686">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6686">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6687">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6687">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6688">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6688">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6689">세기 및 성별에 따라 결정되는 1자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6689">One digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6690">4자리 출생 지역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6690">Four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6691">앞 번호가 동일한 사람을 구분하기 위해 사용되는 1자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6691">One digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6692">검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6692">A check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6693">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6693">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6694">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6694">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6695">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6695">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6696">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6696">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6697">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6697">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6698">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6698">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6699">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6699">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6700">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6701">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6701">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6702">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6702">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6703">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6703">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6704">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6704">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6705">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6705">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6706">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6706">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6710">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6710">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6711">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6711">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6712">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6712">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6713">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6713">Eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6714">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6715">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6715">Eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6716">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6716">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6717">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6717">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6718">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6718">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6719">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6719">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6720">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6720">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6721">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6721">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6722">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6722">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6723">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6723">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6760">스페인 국립 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6760">Spain national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6761">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6761">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6762">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6763">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6763">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6764">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6765">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6765">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6766">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6766">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6767">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6767">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6768">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6769">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6769">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6770">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6771">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6771">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6772">정규식이 해당  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6772">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6773">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6773">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Spain national identification number -->
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6797">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6797">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6798">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6798">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6799">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6799">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6800">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 문자 및 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6800">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6801">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6801">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6802">문자와 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자리 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6802">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6803">두 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6803">Two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6804">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6804">One digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6805">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6805">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6806">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6806">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6807">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6807">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6808">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6808">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6809">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6809">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6810">정규식이 해당  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6810">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6811">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6811">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6812">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6812">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6813">**Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6813">**Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6814">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6814">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6815">스페인 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6815">spain passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6816">passport 책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6816">passport book</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6817">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6817">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6818">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6818">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6819">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6819">libreta pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6820">número pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6820">número pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6821">españa pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6821">españa pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6822">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6822">pasaporte</span></span>


## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6823">스페인 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6823">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6824">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6824">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6825">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6826">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6826">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6827">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6828">11-12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6828">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6829">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6829">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6830">정방향 슬래시 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6830">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6831">7-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6831">7-8 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6832">정방향 슬래시 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6832">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6833">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6833">Two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6834">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6834">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6835">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6835">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6836">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6836">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6837">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6837">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6838">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6838">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6839">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6839">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6840">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6840">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6841">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6841">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6842">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6842">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6843">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6843">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6844">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6845">지정 된 패턴에 7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 한 가지 또는 두 개의 문자가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6845">Seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6846">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6847">스페인 국내 Id 카드가 있는 스페인어 (자연 사용자):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6847">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6848">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6848">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6849">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6849">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6850">스페인 국가 Id 카드가 없는 상주 하지 않는 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6850">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6851">1 개의 대문자 "L" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6851">One uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6852">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6852">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6853">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6853">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6854">스페인 국가 Id 카드를 사용 하지 않고 14 년 동안 상주 하는 Spaniards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6854">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6855">1 개의 대문자 "K" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6855">One uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6856">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6856">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6857">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6857">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6858">Foreigner의 식별 번호를 사용 하는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6858">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6859">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z" (대/소문자 구분)의 대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6859">One uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6860">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6860">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6861">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6861">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6862">Foreigner의 Id 번호가 없는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6862">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6863">"M"을 나타내는 대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6863">One uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6864">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6864">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6865">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6865">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6866">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6867">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6867">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6868">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6869">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6869">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6870">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6870">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6871">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6871">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6872">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6872">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6873">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6873">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6904">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6904">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6905">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6905">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6906">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6906">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6907">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6907">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6908">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6908">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6909">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6909">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6910">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" (여기에서 "pwd" 앞에 소문자 문자가 오지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6910">The string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6911">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6911">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6912">달러 기호 ($), 백분율 기호 (%, 부등호 (>), 기호 (@), 따옴표 ("), 세미콜론 (;), 왼쪽 중괄호 ([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호 ({))가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6912">Any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6913">세미콜론 (;), 슬래시 (/) 또는 따옴표 (")가 아닌 7-128 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6913">Any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6914">세미콜론 (;) 또는 따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6914">A semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6915">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6916">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6916">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6917">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6918">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6918">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6919">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6919">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6920">CEP_GlobalFilter의 키워드를 찾을 수 **없습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6920">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6921">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6921">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6922">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6922">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6923">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6923">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6924">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6924">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6925">일부 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6925">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6926">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6926">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6927">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6927">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6928">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6928">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6929">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6929">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6930">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6930">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6931">암호나 pwd에 0-2 공백, 등호 (=), 0-2 공백 및 별표 (\*)-----------------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6931">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6932">암호나 pwd 뒤에 다음이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6932">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6933">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6933">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6934">보다 작음 기호 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6934">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6935">대문자나 소문자, digits, 별표 (\*), 하이픈 (-), 밑줄 (_) 또는 공백 문자인 1-200 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6935">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6936">보다 큼 기호 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6936">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6937">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6937">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6938">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6938">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6939">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6939">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6940">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6940">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6941">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6941">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6942">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6942">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6943">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6943">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6944">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6944">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6945">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6945">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6946">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6946">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6947">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6947">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6948">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6948">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6949">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6949">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6950">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6950">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6951">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6951">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6952">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6953">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6953">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6954">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6955">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6955">Ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6956">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6956">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6957">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6957">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6958">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6958">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6959">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6959">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6960">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6960">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6961">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6961">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6962">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6962">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6963">정규식이 해당  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6963">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6964">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6964">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6965">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6965">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6966">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6966">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6967">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6967">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6968">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6968">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6969">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6969">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6970">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6970">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6971">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6971">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6972">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6972">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6973">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6973">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6974">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6974">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6975">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6975">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6976">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6976">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6977">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6977">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6978">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6978">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6979">körkort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6979">körkort</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6980">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6980">Sweden National ID</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6981">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6981">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6982">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6983">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6983">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6984">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6985">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6985">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6986">2-4자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6986">2-4 digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6987">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6987">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6988">구분 기호 "-" 또는 "+"(선택 사항) 및</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6988">Delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional), plus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6989">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6989">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6990">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6991">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6991">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6992">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6993">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6993">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6994">Func_swedish_national_identifier 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6994">The function Func_swedish_national_identifier finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-6995">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6995">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden National ID -->
<Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6996">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6996">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6997">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6997">No</span></span>
   
## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-6998">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6998">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-6999">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-6999">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7000">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7000">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7001">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7001">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7002">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7002">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7003">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7003">Eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7004">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7005">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7005">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7006">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7007">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7007">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7008">Regex_sweden_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7008">The regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7009">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7009">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7010">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7010">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7011">Keyword_sweden_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7011">A keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7042">스웨덴 주민 등록 번호 또는 이와 동등한 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7042">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7043">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7043">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7044">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7045">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7045">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7046">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7047">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7047">12 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7048">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 8 자리 숫자 (YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7048">Eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7049">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7049">Three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7050">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성에 홀수를 할당 하는 성별과 암의 짝수를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7050">The last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7051">최대 1990의 일련 번호를 사용 하 여 전화를 corresponded 하는 국가 (1947 이전 1947에는 immigrants 앞에 탄생 한 경우)에는 세금 기록에 따라 해당 번호에 대 한 특수 코드 (일반적으로 9 자리 숫자)가 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7051">Up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7052">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7052">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7053">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7053">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7054">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7054">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7055">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7055">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7056">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7056">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7057">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7057">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7058">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7058">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7059">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7059">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7060">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7060">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7061">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7061">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7062">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7062">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7063">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7063">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7064">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7064">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7065">개인 id 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7065">personal id no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7066">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7066">identity no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7069">personnummer id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7069">personnummer id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7070">personligt id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7070">personligt id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7071">unikt id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7071">unikt id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7072">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7072">personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7073">identifikationsnumret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7073">identifikationsnumret</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7074">personnummer #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7074">personnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7075">identifikationsnumret #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7075">identifikationsnumret#</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7076">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7076">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7077">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7077">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7078">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7078">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7079">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 숫자와 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7079">Ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7080">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7080">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7081">10 자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7081">Ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7082">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7082">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7083">더하기 기호, 빼기 기호 또는 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7083">A plus sign, minus sign, or backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7084">다음은 식별 번호를 고유 하 게 만드는 3 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7084">Three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7085">1990 이전에 실행 된 번호의 경우 일곱째 및 여덟 번째 숫자는 출생 또는 외부에서 태어난 사람의 국가를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7085">For numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7086">아홉 번째 위치의 숫자는 성별에 대 한 홀수 또는 암도를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7086">The digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7087">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7087">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7088">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7088">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7089">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7089">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7090">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7090">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7091">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7091">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7092">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7092">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7093">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7093">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7094">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7094">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7095">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7095">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7121">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7121">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7122">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7122">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7123">4개의 문자, 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7123">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7124">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7124">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7125">4개의 문자, 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7125">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7126">4문자 은행 코드(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7126">Four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7127">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7127">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7128">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7128">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7129">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7129">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7130">1-3개 문자 또는 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7130">1-3 letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7131">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7131">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7132">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7132">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7133">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7133">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7134">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7134">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7135">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7135">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7136">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7136">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7170">대만식 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7170">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7171">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7172">1개의 문자, 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7172">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7173">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7174">1개의 문자, 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7174">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7175">1개 문자(영문, 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7175">One letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7176">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7176">The digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7177">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7177">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7178">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7178">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7179">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7179">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7180">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7180">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7181">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7181">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7182">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7182">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7183">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7183">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7184">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7184">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7185">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7185">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7186">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7186">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7187">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7187">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7205">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7205">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7206">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7206">Biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7207">비-생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7207">Non-biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7208">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7208">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7209">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7209">Biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7210">숫자 "3" </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7210">The digit "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7211">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7211">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7212">비-생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7212">Non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7213">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7213">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7214">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7215">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7215">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="a697e-7216">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a697e-7217">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7217">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7218">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7218">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="a697e-7219">Keyword_taiwan_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a697e-7219">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
